item.title: Ford Kills the All-Electric F-150 as It Rethinks Its EV Ambitions
item.description: The move comes as a response to the Trump administration's waning support for electrification and a weakening consumer market.

item.title: Cozy Earth Is Offering 40 Percent Off Pajamas Right Now
item.description: Rarely are deals better than what you see on Black Friday, but Cozy Earth is upping the ante for this pajama sale.

item.title: Get 22 Percent Off One of Our (and Taylor Swift’s) Favorite Pillows
item.description: Eagle-eyed Swifties have ID’d the star’s pillow brand in a recent TV show appearance, and it’s one of my favorites as well. Coop is having a special s...

item.title: Nvidia Becomes a Major Model Maker With Nemotron 3
item.description: The world’s top chipmaker wants open source AI to succeed—perhaps because closed models increasingly run on its rivals’ silicon.

item.title: This Startup Wants to Build Self-Driving Car Software—Super Fast
item.description: The autonomous vehicle industry is heating up thanks to advances in AI. But can those same innovations help startups like HyprLabs build safe tech?
